synopsis.text: Hacchouya Shouta, a high school student at a magic academy, finds his ordinary life taking an extraordinary turn when a princess from Majieeru, the birthplace of magic, suddenly intrudes upon his morning miso soup tasting ritual. For a century, magic has been recognized as an enigmatic force rivaling science, but the discovery of MISO, the Material of an Impediment to the Sorcerer's Orders, has transformed magic from a unique ability into a skill that can be honed and perfected. Caught up in the princess's unexpected arrival and the dangerous enemies that follow her, Shouta embarks on an unforeseen adventure in a world where magic and science collide.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
